attributes.action: Retain the Free BBC TV Licence for ALL Over-75s
attributes.additional_details: It is a further financial imposition on hard pressed old people and was wrongly handed back to BBC management to control. As the BBC is ultimately a State owned/controlled organisation it is irrelevant whether it or the State funds it.
attributes.background:
Re-instate the Free BBC TV Licence for All Over 75s which the BBC are threatening to limit to those on Pension Credit only. 
Paid for by Government if necessary.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300425
